function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exhaust vents positioned in the lower part of the room may lead to air contamination and increased risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission and exposure to contaminants for room occupants and guinea pigs.","Mitigation":"Repositioning exhaust vents to ensure proper air circulation and ventilation.","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers, and air quality monitoring devices.","People":"Room occupants, guinea pigs, and research staff.","Owner":"Building maintenance, HVAC technicians, and researchers."},{"Description":"Wire mesh floors in animal cages may not effectively prevent faecal-oral transmission of TB.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission among guinea pigs housed in the exposure chambers.","Mitigation":"Replacing wire mesh floors with solid floors or implementing additional infection control measures.","Technologies":"Solid floor cages, disinfection protocols, and regular health monitoring of guinea pigs.","People":"Research staff, animal care personnel, and facility management.","Owner":"Researchers, animal care personnel, and facility management."},{"Description":"Use of UV lights and their maintenance may expose healthcare staff and patients to adverse UV effects.","Impact":"Increased risk of UV-related health effects for healthcare staff and patients.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict protocols for UV light maintenance, monitoring UV exposure levels, and providing protective measures for healthcare staff and patients.","Technologies":"UV exposure meters, protective clothing, and regular UV intensity measurement.","People":"Healthcare staff, patients, and maintenance personnel.","Owner":"Hospital management, maintenance personnel, and healthcare staff."}]}
